title: 她像我一样开心。
answer: She is as happy as I.

title: 为什么她像你一样开心呢？
answer: Why is she as happy as you?

title: 她像我一样开心因为我们今天要去动物园。
answer: She is as happy as I because we want to go to the zoo today.

title: 为什么你弟弟像她妹妹一样伤心呢？
answer: Why is your brother as sad as her sister?

title: 我弟弟像她妹妹一样伤心因为这个早上他们必须学英文。
answer: My brother is as sad as her sister because they have to learn English this morning.

title: 你学英文（学得）好吗？
answer: Do you learn English well?

title: 是的，我学英文（学得）非常好。
answer: Yes, I learn English very well.

title: 我英文学得像她一样好。
answer: I learn English as well as she.

title: 他和你一样聪明吗？
answer: Is he as smart as you?

title: 不，他比我聪明。
answer: No, he is smarter than I.

title: 虽然他比你聪明，你工作比他努力。
answer: Although he is smarter than you, you work harder than he.

title: 因为我工作比他努力，我比他富有。
answer: Because I work harder than he, I am richer than he.

title: 你的女儿比他的女儿漂亮吗？
answer: Is your daughter more beautiful than his daughter?

title: 是的，我的女儿比他的女儿漂亮。
answer: Yes, my daughter is more beautiful than his daughter.

title: 你比那个医生快乐吗？
answer: Are you happier than that doctor?

title: 是的，我比那个医生快乐。
answer: Yes, I am happier than that doctor.

title: 那只狐狸是森林里跑最快的。
answer: That fox runs the fastest (the most quickly) in the forest.

title: 为什么那只狐狸是森林里跑最快的？
answer: Why does that fox run the fastest (the most quickly) in the forest?

title: 因为它跑得比那只老虎还快。
answer: Because it runs faster(more quickly) than that tiger.

title: 这朵花是森林里最漂亮的（the most beautiful）花。
answer: The flower is the most beautiful flower in the forest.

title: 为什么这朵花是森林里最漂亮的花？
answer: Why is the flower the most beautiful flower in the forest?

title: 因为这朵花跟你一样漂亮。
answer: Because this flower is as beautiful as you.

title: 那个农夫是镇（town）上最富有的（the richest）人。
answer: That farmer is the richest person in the town.

title: 为什么那个农夫是镇上最富有的人？
answer: Why is that farmer the richest person in the town?

title: 因为那个农夫工作跟我一样（as hard as）努力。
answer: Because that farmer works as hard as I.

title: 这个棒球选手（player）是学校里最好的（the best）。
answer: This baseball player is the best in the school.

title: 他也是学校里最高大的（biggest）学生。
answer: He is also the biggest student in the school.

title: 那个老师是学校里最差的（the worst）。
answer: That teacher is the worst in the school.

title: 你更（more）喜欢游泳吗？
answer: Do you like to swim more?

title: 我喜欢游泳多于（more than）我喜欢跑步。
answer: I like to swim more than I like to run.

title: 我最（most）喜欢游泳了。
answer: I like to swim most.
